::Battera::

She looks at him. "Being Maximal or Predacon, it doesn't matter.  You 
have a choice to fight. I choose to work for peace.  I know bots on 
both sides who would rather fight than even think of peace. It's all 
they know and wouldn't know what to do if the fighing stopped."
she looked down. 





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> "No its not", he says chuckling a little. "But then
> again being normal is very overrated." He smiled
> again.
> "To tell you the truth, I don't want to fight either,
> but I'm a Maximal, so what choice do I have?"
